name: ATTITUDE Body Lotion for Baby, EWG Verified, Plant and Mineral-Based Ingredients, Vegan Personal Care Products, Sensitive Skin, Unscented, 16 Fl Oz
short_description: EWG VERIFIED: This baby lotion is certified EWG Verified and made with clean ingredients that meet the Environmental Working Group's strict health and safety standards so you can feel confident that it does not contain any potentially concerning ingredients.

CLEAN FORMULA: This baby lotion sensitive skin is formulated with 98.9% natural origin ingredients and is free from SLS et SLES, petrolatum, mineral oil, and artificial dyes for a worry-free experience.
MADE WITH KIND INGREDIENTS: This ATTITUDE baby lotion is enriched with oat extract, to improve the appearance of dry and damaged skin while soothing discomfort related to dryness.
UNSCENTED: No added fragrance, making it ideal for those with fragrance sensitivities, delicate skin or anyone to prefer to keep it simple.
VEGAN & SUSTAINABLE : This baby body lotion is vegan and dermatologically tested. Packaged in a highly recyclable HPDE plastic bottle.
product_description: ATTITUDE Sensitive Natural Baby Body Lotion is the perfect everyday baby lotion to nourish and protect delicate skin. Formulated with 98.9% naturally sourced ingredients, this fragrance free baby lotion is enriched with oat extract to soothe discomfort and improve the appearance of dry, damaged, or sensitive skin. Lightweight and non-greasy, it absorbs easily and provides gentle hydration, making it an ideal baby face lotion as well as a body moisturizer. Dermatologically tested and EWG VERIFIED, this unscented baby lotion is fit for sensitive skin. Whether you’re at home or on the go, its convenient size makes it a great travel baby lotion and an essential for any diaper bag. Parents love it as a reliable dry skin cream and part of their clean skin care moisturizers routine. Pair this lotion with ATTITUDE’s baby shampoo or baby soap for the perfect baby soap and lotion set, or combine it with our baby wash for a complete baby wash and lotion routine. It is the perfect match for families looking for an alternative that’s vegan, and worry-free.

name: Baby Dove Fragrance Free Lotion, Sensitive Moisture, 13 Ounce (Pack of 3)
short_description: Fragrance Free, Hypoallergenic and pH-neutral formula for sensitive skin
Our most caring and safety-tested formula is dermatologist and pediatrician tested
Gently moisturizes baby skin for 24 hours and soothes dry skin from the first use
We include a combination of caring ingredients that are needed to effectively care for baby skin
Our caring formulas are created without dyes, parabens or phthalates
product_description: The best lotion for babies with sensitive skin should gently nourish and care for their delicate skin. And did you know your little one’s precious skin can lose essential nutrients and moisture through bathing? That’s why we created Baby Dove Sensitive Moisture Lotion, which is fragrance free and moisturizes your baby’s skin for up to 24 hours to help leave baby’s delicate skin soft and nourished. Dermatologist and pediatrician tested, this baby lotion is ideal for daily use – soothing and caring for their sensitive skin. Give your little one’s sensitive skin the care it deserves. With a gentle, hypoallergenic and pH-neutral formula, this baby lotion for sensitive skin is safe to use on newborns and is suitable for eczema prone skin as well. The National Eczema Association has awarded the Seal of Acceptance™ to the full line of Baby Dove Sensitive Moisture products. Consider using it after our Tip to Toe Wash during bath time to soothe and moisturize your baby’s sensitive skin, leaving it silky soft. Try the full range of new Baby Dove Sensitive Moisture products: Tip to Toe Wash, Lotion and Wipes. Baby Dove is the brand parents can trust to gently cleanse and moisturize baby’s sensitive skin. And if you love our products, let us know by leaving a review!

name: CeraVe Baby Eczema Relief Cream, 1% Colloidal Oatmeal Cream With Vitamin E & Ceramides, Soothes & Calms Itchy Skin, Developed With Pediatric Dermatologist, Fragrance Free, 5oz
short_description: [ 1% COLLOIDAL OATMEAL ] This baby cream for eczema helps relieve itching due to eczema, ensuring baby's skin feels soothed and calmed. Suitable for babies 1 month and older.
[ VITAMIN E ] Baby eczema lotion with Vitamin E nourishes the skin, leaving it hydrated, smoother, and softer, combined with 1% colloidal oatmeal.
[ MVE DELIVERY TECHNOLOGY ] This eczema baby cream provides all-day hydration, ensuring quick absorption without leaving skin oily or greasy.
[ HYPOALLERGENIC FORMULA ] Developed with pediatric dermatologists, this baby moisturizer is fragrance-free, paraben-free, dye-free, gentle for daily use.
[ 3 ESSENTIAL CERAMIDES ] Moisturizes and maintains the protective skin barrier, suitable for dry, atopy-prone skin. FSA Eligible & HSA Eligible.
product_description: Baby skin is naturally more delicate, permeable, and prone to irritation than adult skin. That’s why it’s important to choose baby products that are designed with their ultra-sensitive skin in mind. CeraVe baby skin care products are developed with pediatric dermatologists, and help maintain their protective skin barrier. Formulated with hyaluronic acid, vitamin E, and three [skin identical] essential ceramides, our gentle, hydrating formulas for babies are fragrance-free, dye-free, and paraben-free. From lotion to ointment, tear-free baby wash, and more, our full range of baby skincare products can help give your baby’s skin the extra-special care it needs. Eczema is a skin condition that causes dry, itchy skin, which can result in flaky skin, bumpy skin, inflamed skin, and irritated skin. That's why it’s essential to keep your eczema rash (also known as atopic dermatitis) moisturized with a targeted eczema cream. Eczema in babies can be distressing for both the little ones and their parents. It is important to choose a cream that provides relief from itching and irritation. Developed with pediatric dermatologists, CeraVe's Eczema Cream For Baby is formulated with 3 skin identical ceramides, 1% colloidal oatmeal, VItamin E and MVE Technology to provide immediate and long-lasting hydration while helping to maintain the baby’s 30% thinner skin barrier. This eczema baby lotion for dry skin has a nourishing formula that works to provide babies with healthier looking skin, helping parents feel happy with the improvement in their baby's skin. This steroid-free, fragrance-free, paraben-free, and hypoallergenic formula is gentle enough for daily use on babies 1 month and older.

NO WORRISOME CHEMICALS: This baby lotion is made without petroleum, mineral oil, artificial fragrance, or preservatives, so it’s safe for your baby's delicate skin. The lotion is made with organic shea butter, rooibos, calendula, olive oil & aloe.

HOW TO USE: Slather this fragrance free baby lotion all over after bath time, in the morning, or whenever skin needs some extra love. Use the baby moisturizer for face or body hydration. For extra soothing, use with Earth Mama’s Simply Non-Scents Baby Wash.
NON-IRRITATING & CLINICALLY TESTED: Earth Mama’s Simply Non-Scents Baby Lotion is NSF/ANSI 305 Certified by Oregon Tilth, Leaping Bunny Certified and Plastic Neutral.

TRUSTED BY MAMAS WORLDWIDE: Earth Mama’s products are formulated with effective organic ingredients, safely supporting families, including pregnant and breastfeeding women and their babies, which means they’re safe for Everyone and Their Mother.

product_description: This soothing baby lotion by SheaMoisture is infused with 100% Virgin Coconut Oil and Certified Organic Shea Butter to hydrate and nourish dry skin and delicate baby skin. Our special blend of Virgin Coconut Oil and Murumuru Butter softens and moisturizes skin. This baby lotion for sensitive skin is also a great newborn and kids lotion. Apply this baby lotion onto baby skin after bath or anytime baby needs an extra kiss of moisture. Made with Certified Organic Shea Butter, this clear skin baby cream and baby moisturizer is also excellent for a calming and relaxing massage before bedtime. This baby moisturizer also soothes baby eczema. Thanks to our Shea Butter, Virgin Coconut Oil and moisture-rich oils, this is the best baby moisturizer for sensitive skin. Shea Moisture is known and loved for its natural, sustainably produced goodness. This is truly a baby cream made with love for baby. SheaMoisture's Story: SheaMoisture is the legacy of Sofi Tucker, a pioneering mother of four and entrepreneur, who sold Shea Butter, African Black Soap and homemade beauty preparations in Sierra Leone in 1912. We honor her vision by continuing to formulate with Raw Shea Butter handcrafted by women in Africa. With every purchase, you show support of our mission to reinvest back in our communities. • Ethically traded ingredients sustainably produced. • Pioneering Community Commerce and Fair Trade since 1912. • Tested on the Tucker family for four generations. Never on animals.

name: Aveeno Baby Healthy Start Nourishing Newborn Balm, Hypoallergenic Baby Skin Balm with Prebiotic Oat Leaves a Nourishing Layer to Care for Newborn Skin, Fragrance-Free, 5 oz
short_description: 5-ounce tube of Aveeno Baby Daily Moisture Healthy Start Balm. Made with prebiotic oat, balm leaves a nourishing layer to help moisturize baby’s developing skin. Gentle enough to start using at day 1 of life for proactive skincare
Healthy Start Newborn Balm is inspired by the vernix, a protective layer on newborn skin that is removed soon after birth. Made with triple oat complex to be gentle on delicate newborn skin
The balm helps support baby’s natural skin moisture barrier, the first line of defense against irritants, germs, humidity, dryness, & allergens

Hypoallergenic, non-greasy, pH-balanced, free of fragrance, parabens & phthalates, and clinically proven to increase hydration. This Daily Moisture Balm is from Aveeno Baby, a pediatrician- & dermatologist-recommended brand
To use balm, gently apply to baby's skin twice a day, morning & evening, for proactive newborn moisturization. Give the moisturizing balm as a baby shower gift, or add to your baby gift registry
product_description: Nourish baby’s developing skin with Aveeno Baby Daily Moisture Healthy Start Newborn Balm. From Aveeno, a dermatologist- & pediatrician-recommended skincare brand, this newborn balm is clinically proven to increase hydration while helping to support newborn's skin moisture barrier—the first line of defense against germs, dryness, irritants, humidity & allergens. The Healthy Start balm is gentle on your newborn’s delicate skin, and is suitable for proactive use at Day 1 of life. Inspired by the vernix, a natural protective layer on newborn skin that is removed soon after birth, this hypoallergenic balm is formulated with a nourishing triple oat complex, is non-greasy, pH-balanced, & free of fragrances, parabens, & phthalates. To help alleviate dryness, gently apply to baby's skin twice a day, morning & evening. The moisturizing balm makes a great addition to any baby shower gift registry.

product_description: Gently moisturize baby's delicate skin for 48 hours with Vivvi & Bloom 2-in-1 Fragrance-Free Baby Face & Body Whip Lotion. EWG Verified.
